doc:
Lindsay Hartley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lindsay_Hartley 0 Lindsay Nicole Hartley (née Korman; born April 17, 1978) is an American actress and singer. She is known for her roles as Theresa Lopez-Fitzgerald Crane Winthrop on Passions, Cara Castillo on All My Children and Arianna Hernandez on Days of Our Lives. Lindsay_Nicole_Hartley ( née_Korman ; born April_17_,_1978 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer . She is_known for her_roles as Theresa_Lopez-Fitzgerald_Crane_Winthrop on Passions , Cara_Castillo on All_My_Children and Arianna_Hernandez on Days of Our_Lives .
